body:
I, and sincerely mean it, don’t understand the attraction of black people. They seem to share a bare minimum in meeting standards of beauty (Jews are a more attractive people than blacks, ffs), they hold their xenophobic standard of beauty in high esteem, and condemn those who “appropriate” it (honestly, what non-black would want cornrows?).

What makes black people attractive, supposedly?

I'd also like to point out that all people make these kinds of excuses for selfish acts in practice, it's not limited to jews.

body:
Right, let's read the Jewish Talmud instead: 

(Talmud, the book that in Yebhamoth 11b says its ok to have sex with 3 year old girls but NOT boys):

Ketubot 11b: When a grown-up man has intercourse with a little girl it is nothing, for when the girl is less than this, it is as if one puts the finger into the eye.

Sanhedrin 55b: A maiden aged three years and a day may be acquired in marriage by coition, and if her deceased husband's brother cohabits with her, she becomes his.

Sanhedrin 59a: "A goy (Gentile) who pries into The Law (Talmud) is guilty of death."

Yebhamoth 11b: "Sexual intercourse with a little girl is permitted if she is three years of age."

Sanhedrin 54b: Pederasty with a child below nine years of age is not deemed as pederasty with a child above that. [four year old girls are just like 18 year olds]

Schabouth Hag. 6d: "Jews may swear falsely by use of subterfuge wording."

Hilkkoth Akum X1: "Do not save Goyim in danger of death."

Hilkkoth Akum X1: "Show no mercy to the Goyim."

Choschen Hamm 388, 15: "If it can be proven that someone has given the money of Israelites to the Goyim, a way must be found after prudent consideration to wipe him off the face of the earth."

Choschen Hamm 266,1: "A Jew may keep anything he finds which belongs to the Akum (Gentile). For he who returns lost property (to Gentiles) sins against the Law by increasing the power of the transgressors of the Law. It is praiseworthy, however, to return lost property if it is done to honor the name of God, namely, if by so doing, Christians will praise the Jews and look upon them as honorable people."

Szaaloth-Utszabot, The Book of Jore Dia 17: "A Jew should and must make a false oath when the Goyim asks if our books contain anything against them."

Baba Necia 114, 6: "The Jews are human beings, but the nations of the world are not human beings but beasts."

Simeon Haddarsen, fol. 56-D: "When the Messiah comes every Jew will have 2800 slaves."

Nidrasch Talpioth, p. 225-L: "Jehovah created the non-Jew in human form so that the Jew would not have to be served by beasts. The non-Jew is consequently an animal in human form, and condemned to serve the Jew day and night."

Aboda Sarah 37a: "A Gentile girl who is three years old can be violated."

Gad. Shas. 2:2: "A Jew may violate but not marry a non-Jewish girl."

Tosefta. Aboda Zara B, 5: "If a goy kills a goy or a Jew, he is responsible; but if a Jew kills a goy, he is NOT responsible."

Schulchan Aruch, Choszen Hamiszpat 388: "It is permitted to kill a Jewish denunciator everywhere. It is permitted to kill him even before he denounces."

Schulchan Aruch, Choszen Hamiszpat 348: "All property of other nations belongs to the Jewish nation, which, consequently, is entitled to seize upon it without any scruples."

Tosefta, Abda Zara VIII, 5: "How to interpret the word 'robbery.' A goy is forbidden to steal, rob, or take women slaves, etc., from a goy or from a Jew. But a Jew is NOT forbidden to do all this to a goy."

Seph. Jp., 92, 1: "God has given the Jews power over the possessions and blood of all nations."

Schulchan Aruch, Choszen Hamiszpat 156: "When a Jew has a Gentile in his clutches, another Jew may go to the same Gentile, lend him money and in turn deceive him, so that the Gentile shall be ruined. For the property of a Gentile, according to our law, belongs to no one, and the first Jew that passes has full right to seize it."

Schulchan Aruch, Johre Deah, 122: "A Jew is forbidden to drink from a glass of wine which a Gentile has touched, because the touch has made the wine unclean."

Nedarim 23b: "He who desires that none of his vows made during the year be valid, let him stand at the beginning of the year and declare, 'Every vow which I may make in the future shall be null'. His vows are then invalid."

Sanhedrin 59a: "Murdering Goyim is like killing a wild animal."

Abodah Zara 26b: "Even the best of the Gentiles should be killed."

JEWS WILL TRY TO DENY THOSE on various apologist websites meant to mitigate the spread of those Talmud quotes. Even a few Evangelical Christians try to soft-ball those actual Talmud quotes.

THE JEW WILL USE 'SUBTERFUGE WORDING' but has no out on any of the above. They are from their Talmud and associated texts!

Talmud sources : 
https://www.sefaria.org

http://www.come-and-hear.com/navigate.html 
https://archive.org/details/TheBabylonianTalmudcompleteSoncinoEnglishTranslation (over 9,000 pages)

or in your local Library, or Synagogue.

Jews claim anti-semitism when they are proven racists themselves from their own book of cultural laws the talmud shown in part above.

![](https://files.catbox.moe/p1z7jr.jpg)

![](https://files.catbox.moe/4o1vst.jpg)

Hundreds of child molesting permissions are in the Jew Torah, but these are just SOME of them with references :

Sanhedrin 55b
A maiden aged three years and a day may be acquired in marriage by coition, and if her deceased husband's brother cohabits with her, she becomes his.

http://www.come-and-hear.com/sanhedrin/sanhedrin_55.html

https://www.sefaria.org/Sanhedrin.55b?lang=bi

Sanhedrin 54b
Pederasty with a child below nine years of age is not deemed as pederasty with a child above that.

https://halakhah.com/sanhedrin/sanhedrin_54.html

https://www.sefaria.org/Sanhedrin.54b?lang=bi

Ketubot 11b
When a grown-up man has intercourse with a little girl it is nothing, for when the girl is less than this, it is as if one puts the finger into the eye

http://www.come-and-hear.com/kethuboth/kethuboth_11.html

https://www.sefaria.org/Ketubot.11b?lang=bi

Disgusting! Sucking baby dicks is mandatory, not optional! :

We learned in the mishna that one sucks blood from the wound after the circumcision was performed on Shabbat. Rav Pappa said: A craftsman who does not suck the blood after every circumcision is a danger to the child undergoing circumcision, and we remove him from his position as circumcisor.

http://www.come-and-hear.com/shabbath/shabbath_133.html

https://www.sefaria.org/Shabbat.133b?lang=bi

![](https://pic8.co/sh/z6ZOXl.jpg)

![](https://files.catbox.moe/2rxr02.jpeg) 

![](https://files.catbox.moe/1tt39r.jpg) 

![](https://files.catbox.moe/tb53va.jpg) 

![](https://files.catbox.moe/97t5hn.jpg) 

![](https://files.catbox.moe/o3byyn.png)

Say, where do those foreskins go anyway? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/qxqi50.jpg)

body:
Those are still all extra-biblical books. Every belief has these kinds of ideas only accepted by some people. The books you cited are only relevant to certain sects of rabbinic judaism and are relatively recent.

However, all jews accept the Hebrew Bible (Old Testament). Let's see what's in that:

Genesis 18:18: "Abraham will surely become a great and powerful nation, and *all nations on earth will be blessed* through him."

Psalm 98:9: "He will *judge the world in righteousness* and *the peoples with equity*."

Psalm 67: "May God be gracious to us and bless us and make his face shine on us—so that your ways may be known on earth, *your salvation among all nations*. May the peoples praise you, God; may all the peoples praise you. May the nations be glad and sing for joy, for you *rule the peoples with equity and guide the nations of the earth*. May the peoples praise you, God; may all the peoples praise you. The land yields its harvest; God, our God, blesses us. May God bless us still, so that *all the ends of the earth* will fear him."

Isaiah 42:6: "I will keep you and will make you to be a covenant for the people and *a light for the Gentiles*,"

Isaiah 66:19: "I will set a sign among them, and I will *send some of those who survive to the nations*—to Tarshish, to the Libyans and Lydians (famous as archers), to Tubal and Greece, and to the distant islands that have not heard of my fame or seen my glory. *They will proclaim my glory among the nations*."

Isaiah 49:6: "I will also make you a *light for the Gentiles*, that my salvation may reach *to the ends of the earth*."

Deuteronomy 10:18: "He defends the cause of the fatherless and the widow, and *loves the foreigner residing among you*, giving them food and clothing."

Leviticus 19:33: "When a foreigner resides among you in your land, *do not mistreat them*. *The foreigner residing among you must be treated as your native-born*. *Love them as yourself*, for you were foreigners in Egypt. I am the Lord your God."

Deuteronomy 10:19: "And you are to *love those who are foreigners*, for you yourselves were foreigners in Egypt."

Leviticus 13:22: "When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and *for the foreigner residing among you*. I am the Lord your God."

Deuteronomy 24:19: "When you are harvesting in your field and you overlook a sheaf, do not go back to get it. *Leave it for the foreigner*, the fatherless and the widow, so that the Lord your God may bless you in all the work of your hands. When you beat the olives from your trees, do not go over the branches a second time. Leave what remains *for the foreigner*, the fatherless and the widow. When you harvest the grapes in your vineyard, do not go over the vines again. Leave what remains *for the foreigner*, the fatherless and the widow. Remember that you were slaves in Egypt. That is why I command you to do this."

Exodus 13:9: "*Do not oppress a foreigner*; *you yourselves know how it feels to be foreigners*, because you were foreigners in Egypt."

Deuteronomy 24:14: "Do not take advantage of a hired worker who is poor and needy, whether that worker is a fellow Israelite *or a foreigner* residing in one of your towns."

Numbers 15:15: "The community is to have *the same rules for you and for the foreigner residing among you*; *this is a lasting ordinance for the generations to come*. *You and the foreigner shall be the same before the Lord*: *The same laws and regulations will apply both to you and to the foreigner residing among you*."

Leviticus 24:22: "You are to have *the same law for the foreigner and the native-born*. I am the Lord your God."

I am not defending the jewish belief at all, I believe the rest of the Bible and judaism rejects the most significant part of it. But there's no reason to single them out when all people behave selfishly and make excuses for it like they do. Plus it's unfair to judge everyone "jewish" using a small subset of books that only certain sects believe. What do you think is worse about jews than atheists, pagans, scientologists, muslims, etc?
body_html:
Those are still all extra-biblical books. Every belief has these kinds of ideas only accepted by some people. The books you cited are only relevant to certain sects of rabbinic judaism and are relatively recent.

However, all jews accept the Hebrew Bible (Old Testament). Let's see what's in that:

Genesis 18:18: "Abraham will surely become a great and powerful nation, and all nations on earth will be blessed through him."

Psalm 98:9: "He will judge the world in righteousness and the peoples with equity."

Psalm 67: "May God be gracious to us and bless us and make his face shine on us—so that your ways may be known on earth, your salvation among all nations. May the peoples praise you, God; may all the peoples praise you. May the nations be glad and sing for joy, for you rule the peoples with equity and guide the nations of the earth. May the peoples praise you, God; may all the peoples praise you. The land yields its harvest; God, our God, blesses us. May God bless us still, so that all the ends of the earth will fear him."

Isaiah 42:6: "I will keep you and will make you to be a covenant for the people and a light for the Gentiles,"

Isaiah 66:19: "I will set a sign among them, and I will send some of those who survive to the nations—to Tarshish, to the Libyans and Lydians (famous as archers), to Tubal and Greece, and to the distant islands that have not heard of my fame or seen my glory. They will proclaim my glory among the nations."

Isaiah 49:6: "I will also make you a light for the Gentiles, that my salvation may reach to the ends of the earth."

Deuteronomy 10:18: "He defends the cause of the fatherless and the widow, and loves the foreigner residing among you, giving them food and clothing."

Leviticus 19:33: "When a foreigner resides among you in your land, do not mistreat them. The foreigner residing among you must be treated as your native-born. Love them as yourself, for you were foreigners in Egypt. I am the Lord your God."

Deuteronomy 10:19: "And you are to love those who are foreigners, for you yourselves were foreigners in Egypt."

Leviticus 13:22: "When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and for the foreigner residing among you. I am the Lord your God."

Deuteronomy 24:19: "When you are harvesting in your field and you overlook a sheaf, do not go back to get it. Leave it for the foreigner, the fatherless and the widow, so that the Lord your God may bless you in all the work of your hands. When you beat the olives from your trees, do not go over the branches a second time. Leave what remains for the foreigner, the fatherless and the widow. When you harvest the grapes in your vineyard, do not go over the vines again. Leave what remains for the foreigner, the fatherless and the widow. Remember that you were slaves in Egypt. That is why I command you to do this."

Exodus 13:9: "Do not oppress a foreigner; you yourselves know how it feels to be foreigners, because you were foreigners in Egypt."

Deuteronomy 24:14: "Do not take advantage of a hired worker who is poor and needy, whether that worker is a fellow Israelite or a foreigner residing in one of your towns."

Numbers 15:15: "The community is to have the same rules for you and for the foreigner residing among you; this is a lasting ordinance for the generations to come. You and the foreigner shall be the same before the Lord: The same laws and regulations will apply both to you and to the foreigner residing among you."

Leviticus 24:22: "You are to have the same law for the foreigner and the native-born. I am the Lord your God."

I am not defending the jewish belief at all, I believe the rest of the Bible and judaism rejects the most significant part of it. But there's no reason to single them out when all people behave selfishly and make excuses for it like they do. Plus it's unfair to judge everyone "jewish" using a small subset of books that only certain sects believe. What do you think is worse about jews than atheists, pagans, scientologists, muslims, etc?

parent.body:
Right, let's read the Jewish Talmud instead: 

(Talmud, the book that in Yebhamoth 11b says its ok to have sex with 3 year old girls but NOT boys):

Ketubot 11b: When a grown-up man has intercourse with a little girl it is nothing, for when the girl is less than this, it is as if one puts the finger into the eye.

Sanhedrin 55b: A maiden aged three years and a day may be acquired in marriage by coition, and if her deceased husband's brother cohabits with her, she becomes his.

Sanhedrin 59a: "A goy (Gentile) who pries into The Law (Talmud) is guilty of death."

Yebhamoth 11b: "Sexual intercourse with a little girl is permitted if she is three years of age."

Sanhedrin 54b: Pederasty with a child below nine years of age is not deemed as pederasty with a child above that. [four year old girls are just like 18 year olds]

Schabouth Hag. 6d: "Jews may swear falsely by use of subterfuge wording."

Hilkkoth Akum X1: "Do not save Goyim in danger of death."

Hilkkoth Akum X1: "Show no mercy to the Goyim."

Choschen Hamm 388, 15: "If it can be proven that someone has given the money of Israelites to the Goyim, a way must be found after prudent consideration to wipe him off the face of the earth."

Choschen Hamm 266,1: "A Jew may keep anything he finds which belongs to the Akum (Gentile). For he who returns lost property (to Gentiles) sins against the Law by increasing the power of the transgressors of the Law. It is praiseworthy, however, to return lost property if it is done to honor the name of God, namely, if by so doing, Christians will praise the Jews and look upon them as honorable people."

Szaaloth-Utszabot, The Book of Jore Dia 17: "A Jew should and must make a false oath when the Goyim asks if our books contain anything against them."

Baba Necia 114, 6: "The Jews are human beings, but the nations of the world are not human beings but beasts."

Simeon Haddarsen, fol. 56-D: "When the Messiah comes every Jew will have 2800 slaves."

Nidrasch Talpioth, p. 225-L: "Jehovah created the non-Jew in human form so that the Jew would not have to be served by beasts. The non-Jew is consequently an animal in human form, and condemned to serve the Jew day and night."

Aboda Sarah 37a: "A Gentile girl who is three years old can be violated."

Gad. Shas. 2:2: "A Jew may violate but not marry a non-Jewish girl."

Tosefta. Aboda Zara B, 5: "If a goy kills a goy or a Jew, he is responsible; but if a Jew kills a goy, he is NOT responsible."

Schulchan Aruch, Choszen Hamiszpat 388: "It is permitted to kill a Jewish denunciator everywhere. It is permitted to kill him even before he denounces."

Schulchan Aruch, Choszen Hamiszpat 348: "All property of other nations belongs to the Jewish nation, which, consequently, is entitled to seize upon it without any scruples."

Tosefta, Abda Zara VIII, 5: "How to interpret the word 'robbery.' A goy is forbidden to steal, rob, or take women slaves, etc., from a goy or from a Jew. But a Jew is NOT forbidden to do all this to a goy."

Seph. Jp., 92, 1: "God has given the Jews power over the possessions and blood of all nations."

Schulchan Aruch, Choszen Hamiszpat 156: "When a Jew has a Gentile in his clutches, another Jew may go to the same Gentile, lend him money and in turn deceive him, so that the Gentile shall be ruined. For the property of a Gentile, according to our law, belongs to no one, and the first Jew that passes has full right to seize it."

Schulchan Aruch, Johre Deah, 122: "A Jew is forbidden to drink from a glass of wine which a Gentile has touched, because the touch has made the wine unclean."

Nedarim 23b: "He who desires that none of his vows made during the year be valid, let him stand at the beginning of the year and declare, 'Every vow which I may make in the future shall be null'. His vows are then invalid."

Sanhedrin 59a: "Murdering Goyim is like killing a wild animal."

Abodah Zara 26b: "Even the best of the Gentiles should be killed."

JEWS WILL TRY TO DENY THOSE on various apologist websites meant to mitigate the spread of those Talmud quotes. Even a few Evangelical Christians try to soft-ball those actual Talmud quotes.

THE JEW WILL USE 'SUBTERFUGE WORDING' but has no out on any of the above. They are from their Talmud and associated texts!

Talmud sources : 
https://www.sefaria.org

http://www.come-and-hear.com/navigate.html 
https://archive.org/details/TheBabylonianTalmudcompleteSoncinoEnglishTranslation (over 9,000 pages)

or in your local Library, or Synagogue.

Jews claim anti-semitism when they are proven racists themselves from their own book of cultural laws the talmud shown in part above.

![](https://files.catbox.moe/p1z7jr.jpg)

![](https://files.catbox.moe/4o1vst.jpg)

Hundreds of child molesting permissions are in the Jew Torah, but these are just SOME of them with references :

Sanhedrin 54b
Pederasty with a child below nine years of age is not deemed as pederasty with a child above that.

https://halakhah.com/sanhedrin/sanhedrin_54.html

https://www.sefaria.org/Sanhedrin.54b?lang=bi

Ketubot 11b
When a grown-up man has intercourse with a little girl it is nothing, for when the girl is less than this, it is as if one puts the finger into the eye

http://www.come-and-hear.com/kethuboth/kethuboth_11.html

https://www.sefaria.org/Ketubot.11b?lang=bi

Disgusting! Sucking baby dicks is mandatory, not optional! :

We learned in the mishna that one sucks blood from the wound after the circumcision was performed on Shabbat. Rav Pappa said: A craftsman who does not suck the blood after every circumcision is a danger to the child undergoing circumcision, and we remove him from his position as circumcisor.

post.title: Burn the coal, pay the toll

body:
They partake in this sin at a much higher rate than any other race or religion outside of maybe muslim. When you consider they control what 98% of everyone sees and hears in the media, it's not "singling them out". They are not victims here. 

When you go through history they have always undermined, subverted, and destroyed civilizations and they used money and degeneracy to do it. They have been kicked out of 109 countries 359 times since 733 BC and some say it's much higher than that. They have an incredible talent for seizing power and then abusing it. They are behind the forced integration of races, mixing of those races, all to degrade the genetic white populace, this is worldwide. 

It is written in their religion to conquer us, but - hey, other people sin too right? So pay no mind as antifa burns your town to the ground funded by Jewish money.

You say you aren't defending it, but you're sure deflecting the shit out of the blame they deserve. 

> Exodus 13:9: "Do not oppress a foreigner; you yourselves know how it feels to be foreigners, because you were foreigners in Egypt."

They are foreigners today. Their true loyalty is Israel. I think it's funny you posted that when it illustrates they directly disobey that in Israel. They only ever push it onto other non-Jewish nations. 

![](https://files.catbox.moe/er7los.jpg)
body_html:
They partake in this sin at a much higher rate than any other race or religion outside of maybe muslim. When you consider they control what 98% of everyone sees and hears in the media, it's not "singling them out". They are not victims here.

When you go through history they have always undermined, subverted, and destroyed civilizations and they used money and degeneracy to do it. They have been kicked out of 109 countries 359 times since 733 BC and some say it's much higher than that. They have an incredible talent for seizing power and then abusing it. They are behind the forced integration of races, mixing of those races, all to degrade the genetic white populace, this is worldwide.

It is written in their religion to conquer us, but - hey, other people sin too right? So pay no mind as antifa burns your town to the ground funded by Jewish money.

You say you aren't defending it, but you're sure deflecting the shit out of the blame they deserve.

Exodus 13:9: "Do not oppress a foreigner; you yourselves know how it feels to be foreigners, because you were foreigners in Egypt."

They are foreigners today. Their true loyalty is Israel. I think it's funny you posted that when it illustrates they directly disobey that in Israel. They only ever push it onto other non-Jewish nations.

parent.body:
Those are still all extra-biblical books. Every belief has these kinds of ideas only accepted by some people. The books you cited are only relevant to certain sects of rabbinic judaism and are relatively recent.

However, all jews accept the Hebrew Bible (Old Testament). Let's see what's in that:

Genesis 18:18: "Abraham will surely become a great and powerful nation, and *all nations on earth will be blessed* through him."

Psalm 98:9: "He will *judge the world in righteousness* and *the peoples with equity*."

Psalm 67: "May God be gracious to us and bless us and make his face shine on us—so that your ways may be known on earth, *your salvation among all nations*. May the peoples praise you, God; may all the peoples praise you. May the nations be glad and sing for joy, for you *rule the peoples with equity and guide the nations of the earth*. May the peoples praise you, God; may all the peoples praise you. The land yields its harvest; God, our God, blesses us. May God bless us still, so that *all the ends of the earth* will fear him."

Isaiah 42:6: "I will keep you and will make you to be a covenant for the people and *a light for the Gentiles*,"

Isaiah 66:19: "I will set a sign among them, and I will *send some of those who survive to the nations*—to Tarshish, to the Libyans and Lydians (famous as archers), to Tubal and Greece, and to the distant islands that have not heard of my fame or seen my glory. *They will proclaim my glory among the nations*."

Isaiah 49:6: "I will also make you a *light for the Gentiles*, that my salvation may reach *to the ends of the earth*."

Deuteronomy 10:18: "He defends the cause of the fatherless and the widow, and *loves the foreigner residing among you*, giving them food and clothing."

Leviticus 19:33: "When a foreigner resides among you in your land, *do not mistreat them*. *The foreigner residing among you must be treated as your native-born*. *Love them as yourself*, for you were foreigners in Egypt. I am the Lord your God."

Deuteronomy 10:19: "And you are to *love those who are foreigners*, for you yourselves were foreigners in Egypt."

Leviticus 13:22: "When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and *for the foreigner residing among you*. I am the Lord your God."

Deuteronomy 24:19: "When you are harvesting in your field and you overlook a sheaf, do not go back to get it. *Leave it for the foreigner*, the fatherless and the widow, so that the Lord your God may bless you in all the work of your hands. When you beat the olives from your trees, do not go over the branches a second time. Leave what remains *for the foreigner*, the fatherless and the widow. When you harvest the grapes in your vineyard, do not go over the vines again. Leave what remains *for the foreigner*, the fatherless and the widow. Remember that you were slaves in Egypt. That is why I command you to do this."

Exodus 13:9: "*Do not oppress a foreigner*; *you yourselves know how it feels to be foreigners*, because you were foreigners in Egypt."

Deuteronomy 24:14: "Do not take advantage of a hired worker who is poor and needy, whether that worker is a fellow Israelite *or a foreigner* residing in one of your towns."

Numbers 15:15: "The community is to have *the same rules for you and for the foreigner residing among you*; *this is a lasting ordinance for the generations to come*. *You and the foreigner shall be the same before the Lord*: *The same laws and regulations will apply both to you and to the foreigner residing among you*."

Leviticus 24:22: "You are to have *the same law for the foreigner and the native-born*. I am the Lord your God."

I am not defending the jewish belief at all, I believe the rest of the Bible and judaism rejects the most significant part of it. But there's no reason to single them out when all people behave selfishly and make excuses for it like they do. Plus it's unfair to judge everyone "jewish" using a small subset of books that only certain sects believe. What do you think is worse about jews than atheists, pagans, scientologists, muslims, etc?

body:
> They partake in this sin at a much higher rate than any other race or religion outside of maybe muslim.

Which sin are you referring to?

> When you consider they control what 98% of everyone sees and hears in the media, it's not "singling them out". They are not victims here.

They are not victims, I was not defending them. I'm just pointing out that plenty of non-jews do the same things and you're being much lighter on them because of your prejudice. The reason they control a lot of money isn't because they're jewish, it just started out with certain people and got passed down to others who were close to them. It's the same reason 98% of the media and academia is dominated by the radical left, it was pretty much just random chance and over time the power was passed to more like-minded people. Yes, jewish people are greedy and abuse others, but that nature is inherent in humans, not just jews.

> When you go through history they have always undermined, subverted, and destroyed civilizations and they used money and degeneracy to do it.

Yes they have, and so have the vast majority of groups that have existed. I don't see jews as any different from them.

> They have an incredible talent for seizing power and then abusing it.

So do all people.

> They are behind the forced integration of races, mixing of those races, all to degrade the genetic white populace, this is worldwide.

So you think that segregation should be enforced, and that white people are better than others just because of their skin color? Let me tell you, plenty of white ethnic groups have done awful things throughout history, heck take ancient Rome or Medieval/Renaissance Europe. Then we have people like Adolf Hitler, Joseph Stalin, Mussolini, Jeffery Epstein, the Clintons, and a whole bunch of others. All white. Plenty of ancient white civilizations prior to Rome were also full of evil. It wasn't because they're white, it was because they were evil. For the same reason the evil non-white groups were evil because they chose to be, not because they weren't white. And yet you complained about jewish racism while engaging in it yourself. You yourself are guilty of many of the things you complain about jews doing.

> but - hey, other people sin too right?

So far you've showed me only things that they do that every other group does. You haven't been able to point out what they do that sets them apart from the vast majority of people.

> So pay no mind as antifa burns your town to the ground funded by Jewish money.

I don't know man, Antifa is pretty openly atheist most of the time. I wouldn't expect them to like jews either because "they're rich" and "rich people bad". The jewish money you mention is in the hands of not-very-serious jews, and funding of antifa and such groups comes from being a wealthy elitist democrat, not a jew. In fact the democratic party has been pretty anti-semitic at times, despite a lot of jewish people voting democratic.

> you're sure deflecting the shit out of the blame they deserve.

I'm doing no such thing. You are the one deflecting the blame off of everyone else that also deserves it, particularly yourself.
body_html:
They partake in this sin at a much higher rate than any other race or religion outside of maybe muslim.

Which sin are you referring to?

When you consider they control what 98% of everyone sees and hears in the media, it's not "singling them out". They are not victims here.

They are not victims, I was not defending them. I'm just pointing out that plenty of non-jews do the same things and you're being much lighter on them because of your prejudice. The reason they control a lot of money isn't because they're jewish, it just started out with certain people and got passed down to others who were close to them. It's the same reason 98% of the media and academia is dominated by the radical left, it was pretty much just random chance and over time the power was passed to more like-minded people. Yes, jewish people are greedy and abuse others, but that nature is inherent in humans, not just jews.

When you go through history they have always undermined, subverted, and destroyed civilizations and they used money and degeneracy to do it.

Yes they have, and so have the vast majority of groups that have existed. I don't see jews as any different from them.

They have an incredible talent for seizing power and then abusing it.

So do all people.

They are behind the forced integration of races, mixing of those races, all to degrade the genetic white populace, this is worldwide.

So you think that segregation should be enforced, and that white people are better than others just because of their skin color? Let me tell you, plenty of white ethnic groups have done awful things throughout history, heck take ancient Rome or Medieval/Renaissance Europe. Then we have people like Adolf Hitler, Joseph Stalin, Mussolini, Jeffery Epstein, the Clintons, and a whole bunch of others. All white. Plenty of ancient white civilizations prior to Rome were also full of evil. It wasn't because they're white, it was because they were evil. For the same reason the evil non-white groups were evil because they chose to be, not because they weren't white. And yet you complained about jewish racism while engaging in it yourself. You yourself are guilty of many of the things you complain about jews doing.

but - hey, other people sin too right?

So far you've showed me only things that they do that every other group does. You haven't been able to point out what they do that sets them apart from the vast majority of people.

So pay no mind as antifa burns your town to the ground funded by Jewish money.

I don't know man, Antifa is pretty openly atheist most of the time. I wouldn't expect them to like jews either because "they're rich" and "rich people bad". The jewish money you mention is in the hands of not-very-serious jews, and funding of antifa and such groups comes from being a wealthy elitist democrat, not a jew. In fact the democratic party has been pretty anti-semitic at times, despite a lot of jewish people voting democratic.

you're sure deflecting the shit out of the blame they deserve.

I'm doing no such thing. You are the one deflecting the blame off of everyone else that also deserves it, particularly yourself.
